tachyon.client

Interface RemoteBlockReader

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    NettyRemoteBlockReader

    public interface RemoteBlockReader
extends Closeable
    The interface to read remote block from data server.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  RemoteBlockReader.Factory
      The factory for the RemoteBlockReader.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ByteBuffer readRemoteBlock(InetSocketAddress address, long blockId, long offset, long length, long lockId, long sessionId)
      Reads a remote block with a offset and length.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.io.Closeable

        close

    • Method Detail

      • readRemoteBlock

        ByteBuffer readRemoteBlock(InetSocketAddress address,
                           long blockId,
                           long offset,
                           long length,
                           long lockId,
                           long sessionId)
                    throws IOException
        Reads a remote block with a offset and length.
        Parameters:
        address - the InetSocketAddress of the data server
        blockId - the id of the block trying to read
        offset - the offset of the block
        length - the length the client wants to read
        lockId - the acquired block lock id
        sessionId - the session id of the client
        Returns:
        a byte buffer containing the remote data block
        Throws:
        IOException - if the remote server is not reachable or responds with failures
